title: LWR WINS NATIONAL WATER AWARD
content: CALGARY, AB – (May 31, 2019) Livestock Water Recycling’s ability to address nutrient pollution from livestock operations has resulted in the technology platform being recognized with a Water’s Next Award for the Water Resources Project/Technology of the year. The Water’s Next national award program honors the achievement and ideas of individuals and companies that successfully work to change water across the country.
